gen:link.label:label: BV733: The sum of the "Index/Unit Linked Assets" from template S.06.02 - template S.06.02 - List of assets and "Index/Unit Linked Derivatives" from template S.08.01 - Open derivatives should be equal or less than the value of the item "assets held for index-linked and unit-linked contracts" reported on the template S.02.01 - Balance sheet. Please note, however, that also liabilities, other than derivatives, may exist and if material could lead to the balance-sheet figure being less than the sum of S.06.02 and S.08.01. -->Template 1: S.02.01; Template 2: S.06.02; Template 3: S.08.01; Template 3: S.08.01; Filter: {S.06.02, c0090}=[s2c_LB:x119] and {S.08.01, c0080}=[s2c_LB:x119]; Expression: {S.02.01, r0220,c0010}>=(sum({S.06.02, c0170,(sNNN)})+sum({S.08.01,c0240,(sNNN)}))

BV733: The sum of the "Index/Unit Linked Assets" from template S.06.02 - template S.06.02 - List of assets and "Index/Unit Linked Derivatives" from template S.08.01 - Open derivatives should be equal or less than the value of the item "assets held for index-linked and unit-linked contracts" reported on the template S.02.01 - Balance sheet. Please note, however, that also liabilities, other than derivatives, may exist and if material could lead to the balance-sheet figure being less than the sum of S.06.02 and S.08.01. -->Template 1: S.02.01; Template 2: S.06.02; Template 3: S.08.01; Template 3: S.08.01; Filter: {S.06.02, c0090}=[s2c_LB:x119] and {S.08.01, c0080}=[s2c_LB:x119]; Expression: {S.02.01, r0220,c0010}>=(sum({S.06.02, c0170,(sNNN)})+sum({S.08.01,c0240,(sNNN)}))
